data.description_html:
This spell creates a shimmering, magical field around the touched creature that averts attacks.
The spell grants the subject a +2 deflection bonus to AC, with an additional +1 to the bonus for every six levels you have (maximum +5 deflection bonus at 18th level).
Material Component: A small parchment with a bit of holy text written upon it.
data.name: Shield of Faith
